game.name: Lofty Lunch
game.desc: Description: Build the tallest sandwich you can by catching the falling ingredients. The game ends when you complete your sandwich by catching a piece of bread. In Free Play you can have extra bread in your sandwich - the game only ends when you press X. Controls: * Arrow Keys - Move your plate * X - Start a new game when you finish the game. Also ends the game when you are in Free Play mode * P - Bring up pause menu to turn on/off Free Play
